title: In Trump Organization Trial, Each Side Finds a Villain
description: In a case that centers on tax law, defense lawyers blame the companyâ€™s former chief financial officer. Prosecutors bring up the former president.
dc:creator: Jonah E. Bromwich, Ben Protess, William K. Rashbaum and Maggie Haberman
media:credit: Hannah Beier for The New York Times
media:description: On Monday, prosecutors tried to link the Trump Organization to its owner, an unpopular figure in his former hometown, but one who does not face charges.
